e-commerce-application.title: E-commerce Application
e-commerce-application.description: Built a scalable e-commerce platform using Angular and .NET (C#). Implemented JWT authentication with guards and interceptors, integrated Razorpay for payments, and designed a responsive UI with Bootstrap.
keyFeatures: Secure authentication with JWT and role-based access
Dynamic admin dashboard for product management
Optimized for mobile and desktop with responsive design
Microservices for scalability and faster deployments

image-processing-application.title: Image Processing Application
image-processing-application.description: Developed a Java-based application for advanced image manipulation, including filtering, color transformations, and histogram generation. The app supports GUI (Swing) and CLI workflows.
keyFeatures: Support for GUI (Swing) and CLI workflows
Unit tested with JUnit for high reliability

portfolio-website.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio-website.description: Created a personal portfolio website using React and Tailwind CSS to showcase skills, projects, and achievements. The site features smooth navigation, responsive design, and interactive elements.
keyFeatures: Dynamic project sections with React Router
